channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-4789] On split, parent region is sticking around in oldest sequenceid to region map though not online; we don't cleanup WALs.
item.description:
Here is log for a particular region:


2011-11-15 05:46:31,382 INFO org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.SplitTransaction: Still waiting on the master to process the split for 8bbd7388262dc8cb1ce2cf4f04a7281d

2011-11-15 05:46:31,483 DEBUG org.apache.hadoop.hbase.zookeeper.ZKAssign: regionserver:7003-0x1337b0b92cd000a-0x1337b0b92cd000a Attempting to transition node 8bbd7388262dc8cb1ce2cf4f04a7281d from RS_ZK_REGION_SPLIT to RS_ZK_REG

ION_SPLIT

item.summary: On split, parent region is sticking around in oldest sequenceid to region map though not online; we don't cleanup WALs.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Possible workaround. Let me do some more testing before commit. I can't find the hole in our accounting of oldest seqid.

Hmmm... I've been running tests w/ this patch in place and have not seen the issue since. I'm going to commit this unless objection. I don't think this the 'real' fix. This patch adds a clear of the raw encoded name after we do the snp-encodedname remove. We shouldn't be having to do this if our accounting is correct. This patch logs when we the misaccounting so hopefully we'll be able to figure whats going on down the line. Will do that in different issue.

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12504307/4789-v2.txt
against trunk revision .

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

-1 tests included. The patch doesn't appear to include any new or modified tests.
Please justify why no new tests are needed for this patch.
Also please list what manual steps were performed to verify this patch.

-1 patch. The patch command could not apply the patch.

Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/300//console

This message is automatically generated.

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12504312/4789-v3.txt
against trunk revision .

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

-1 tests included. The patch doesn't appear to include any new or modified tests.
Please justify why no new tests are needed for this patch.
Also please list what manual steps were performed to verify this patch.

-1 patch. The patch command could not apply the patch.

Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/307//console

This message is automatically generated.

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12504335/4789-v4.txt
against trunk revision .

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

-1 tests included. The patch doesn't appear to include any new or modified tests.
Please justify why no new tests are needed for this patch.
Also please list what manual steps were performed to verify this patch.

+1 javadoc. The javadoc tool did not generate any warning messages.

+1 javac. The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

-1 findbugs. The patch appears to introduce 60 new Findbugs (version 1.3.9) warnings.

+1 release audit. The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

-1 core tests. The patch failed these unit tests:
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.TestShell
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.TestAdmin
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.TestDistributedLogSplitting

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/308//testReport/
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/308//artifact/trunk/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarnings.html
Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/308//console

This message is automatically generated.
Committed branch and trunk. Can open new issue if the logging in here turns up more info on why this condition.

This issue was closed as part of a bulk closing operation on 2015-11-20. All issues that have been resolved and where all fixVersions have been released have been closed (following discussions on the mailing list).
